text: Pooram is a 1989 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Nedumudi Venu, starring Nedumudi Venu ,Vishnu and Maathu in the lead roles.http://spicyonion.com/title/pooram-malayalam-movie/ ==Cast== * Kaithapram Damodaran * Nedumudi Venu * Maathu * Innocent * Thilakan * KPAC Lalitha * Murali * Sankaradi * Sreenivasan * Krishnankutty Nair * MG Soman * M. S.
